name: Chatham
description: Chatham is a picturesque coastal town located at the elbow of Cape Cod. Known for its beautiful beaches, historic lighthouse, and charming downtown area, it's a popular summer destination.

airports.name: Chatham Municipal Airport
airports.description: Small public airport serving private and charter flights

bus_services.name: Cape Cod Regional Transit Authority (CCRTA)
bus_services.description: Provides public bus service throughout Chatham and Cape Cod

ferry_services.name: Chatham Ferry Service
ferry_services.description: Offers ferry services to Nantucket and Martha's Vineyard from Chatham Fish Pier

visitor_center.name: Chatham Chamber of Commerce Information Booth

tourist_information.best_time_to_visit: Late spring to early fall (May to September)

popular_events.name: Chatham Independence Day Parade
popular_events.description: Annual Fourth of July parade through downtown Chatham

popular_events.name: Chatham Festival of the Arts
popular_events.description: Annual outdoor art festival featuring local and regional artists
